alert.note: Alert for Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 11:42PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Oldham and southwestern Hartley Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Romero, or 14 miles northeast of Nara Visa, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Romero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
